snippet.title: Nancy Drew: The Haunted Carousel Official Trailer | Nancy Drew Mystery Games
snippet.description:
Watch the official game trailer for Nancy Drew: The Haunted Carousel here! Order the game @ https://www.herinteractive.com/shop-games/nancy-drew-the-haunted-carousel/ 

Take a spin with danger to unravel the mystery of a ghostly merry-go-round in this interactive detective game! You, as Nancy Drew, are invited to the Jersey shore to investigate a series of mishaps at the Captain's Cove Amusement Park. First, the lead horse was stolen from the carousel. Then the roller coaster suddenly lost power, resulting in a serious accident. Now the merry-go-round is mysteriously starting up in the middle of the night. Play The Haunted Carousel to try and unravel the mysterious happenings surrounding this beautiful antique carousel!

visit us: http://www.herinteractive.com
